MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L25 postcode area of Woolton, affecting properties in School Lane, Doe Park Courtyard and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.59pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on 28th of Jan 2021
